website_summaries.verdict: Book is based on scientific research and provides the tools for beginners as well as keto veterans to succeed.
pros: Written for those who are consumers of information and looking for a dietary lifestyle change with immediate results
We love that this book is goal-focused and provides conversion charts to help you along your way
cons: Recipes can be time consuming and expensive

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY INFORMATIVE 😝
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I do not understand why all the good ratings 🤔 I am a beginner at this and I really wanted a book with information ...AND THIS IS REALLY NOT IT!!! WASTE OF $10 ...very limited pages on information ....Buy the book in the picture here it is packed with information AND recipes... this book is 10 STARS OUT OF FIVE...
customer_reviews.author: Teresamarie

customer_reviews.title: Great guide
customer_reviews.text: Great guide for beginners, has lots a info, and well researched material to help you reach your goals. (lost 30lbs in under 3 months)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This book is great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This book is great for beginners! We have tried several recipes and they are great. nothing crazy to buy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Made these today with one of the recipes from week 1
customer_reviews.text: This book was incredibly helpful for a keto newbie. I love that there are shopping lists that coordinate with the recipes! That was the best. I took it to the market and shopped from the book ! If Amy Ramos writes another book and includes this again with new lists ans recipes.. I'll buy it. PS: the recipes for week 1 were actually delish. Can't wait to try week 2. My only suggestion for the reader would be if you are only cooking for 1... Make sure to not over purchase as the recipes are for multiple servings!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Labor intensive, unsavory recipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cookbook because tha macros were already figured in and for the recipes. Since I’m new to the Keto diet I needed help finding recipes with the right macros. The recipes are VERY labor intensive. You will spend quite a long time in the kitchen preparing these meals. That’s ok if you like being in the kitchen (I don’t) for long periods of time. Secondly, the recipes are not very tasty so I resented spending all that time in the kitchen for meals that were not that great. Finally, I was hungry for a large portion of the day as these meals are not very filling. To sum up: I wish I’d bought a different Keto book. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Todd Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So I just received my book, and not only are the pages falling out, the print is half off the pages so you can’t read full sentences, but also the entire book was bound upside down and backwards . Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Kowieski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy book to get to know the Keto diet.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent book. It gives an overall description of the diet and what it can do. It starts with explaining, giving hints for success, shopping lists, recipes, and sample meals. Very easy to follow. I started the diet for two weeks and lost weight, lowered my sugar A1c and in such a short time felt like I was more awake, alert, and physically stronger with less ailments. My doctors were finally pleased with my progress. I'm ordering another recipe book so as to keep having choices to keep on this diet.
customer_reviews.author: Annette P.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter book
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand and follow. Great recipes and conversion charts. Gives you a real understanding of how our body breaks down fat as opposed to carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Robin b

customer_reviews.title: Good book to help commence a Keto diet.
customer_reviews.text: This book was a great book to get me started on a Keto diet. Went from 232 to 174 lbs. The author encouraged use of healthy fats. The keto diet does take a leap of faith, you must be fully committed. Recommend you read the theory and find some recipes to get started. Beware you may get Keto Flu starting out, be prepared for this.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Batt

customer_reviews.title: Missing 2 Chapters, pp 97-128
customer_reviews.text: I've never ever, ever, ever, never bought a new book that was missing pages. What? Chapters 7 and 8, including pages 97 through 128 do not exist. Is it a faulty book? After going to the store, spending $400.00 on my first week groceries (as in FOUR HUNDRED DOLLARS!!!!!), I proceeded to cook my first recipe, Lamb Leg with Sundried Tomato Pesto on page 97 and Cheesy Mashed Cauliflower on page 111. But, there's no page 97. And, there's no page 111. WTF?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chandler

customer_reviews.title: No photos but good recipes
customer_reviews.text: No photos but recipes I have tried are great. I eat with my eyes so prefer cookbooks with photos.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Poorly written.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the recipes are just plain common sense. Like fry some bacon and put it with scrambled eggs. Other recipes are poorly written. The first recipe I made called for 3 oz of gelatin. I knew it had to be wrong but I followed the instructions and ended up with an inedible rubbery cheesecake. .
customer_reviews.author: MerryLamb

customer_reviews.title: Why not make recipies for one serving??
customer_reviews.text: Yes the book is informative. But the first day meal plan of 14 has recipes for 8 servings, 12 servings, 4 servings, 2 servings, and 8 servings. I want a cookbook that has recipies for one that I don’t have to devife all of the ingredients up to make one serving. It is much easier to double your ingredients than to try to take a recipe for 8 and figure out how to make only one :(
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice but very few photos!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a book with mostly all text, this might be for you. I'm looking for a keto cookbook with lots of photos of the completed recipes. I'm disappointed that all these electronic cookbooks a devoid of images - if anyone can recommend one with photos, please let me know here: gaynel 13 at gmail . com
customer_reviews.author: Gaynel13

customer_reviews.title: No information about the diet itself
customer_reviews.text: I thought being a diet book for beginners, it would teach me everything about the diet. The book is basically a 2 week menu plan with recipees. After 2 weeks, you know nothing to proceed on your own. No facts on what to do, how to proceed. I was shocked that it didn't even have a list of carb amounts for common foods to help me figure out what to eat. It has a section of desert recipees, yet no deserts listed in the daily meal plan. Nothing complete about this book.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: You get to guess.
customer_reviews.text: Ready to make a recipe from this book this morning. Says it makes 3 servings (page 86) So I have no idea how big the balls should be. Is it multiple little balls (bite sized, as it is described as an appetizer) or 3 big ones? I am sure cooking times will be effected by this omission. No pictures to help clarify, and similar issues with other recipes. Recipes are cooking instructions, and this one omits some important points. Very frustrated and tired of buying poorly written cook books.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I had other books in hard back that were more difficult to follow and recipes were to advanced or I could not find the ingredients. I will use this everyday .
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Book with Great Ideas
customer_reviews.text: Great book! It's helping my husband keep his blood sugar down. I particularly love its recipes--especially the one for granola. I've been making granola for years, but it became difficult for my husband to consume when he came down with Type 2 Diabetes. Now he can have granola again that doesn't jack up his blood sugar. When my kids visit, they also enjoy this granola because it's so delicious. Fortunately for them, they don't need to worry about their blood sugar, but it's just too delicious to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Huff

customer_reviews.title: Not quite complete
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that there are some basic concepts that are glossed over but leave me puzzled. For instance, where does one find alcohol-free vanilla? What is protein powder, is it whey, is it soy, is it something else? And if you are going to use a measurement of "a scoop" of powder, what does that equal, a tablespoon, a pound? Also, the recipes are all for four servings...that makes for a lot of leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: T. E. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Reading labels
customer_reviews.text: Good book for this type of diet...1st week is hard, but after a While it gets easier. I didn't do the 30 day diet. Just watch carbs, sugars, grains, etc. In 3 mos. Lost a bit over 31 lbs.,and without much of any exercise..
customer_reviews.author: Donna Borchin

customer_reviews.title: I Did Not Find This Book Particularly Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book was pretty superficial in the information it provided. I found the recipes, which I didn't realize I was ordering a cookbook, pretty superficial as well. The carbohydrate information for various foods was EXTREMELY limited. I cam away thinking the only foods I could eat on this diet were all forms of meat. LOTS of healthy fats, avocados, cheese, very few green vegetables, and no fruit. Since it took several days for me to receive this book, I had already implemented a rudimentary, more moderate, version of this diet, which was good. I decided to stick with that and forgo eating all the fat and meat-derived protein this book recommends. It did not feel balanced or healthy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Living

customer_reviews.title: I don’t feel equipped to get started with Keto
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read the explanation of Keto in this book and feel only slightly better informed than I was prior to reading it. Not much depth. Whatever is meant by ‘complete’ is certainly not what I was expecting. In reality, it’s couple of sparse chapters about what Keto is, and a collection of recipes that fail to mention portion sizes, along with shopping lists that would bankrupt the average consumer. I don’t feel equipped to get started with Keto, which was my hope when I ordered ‘The Complete Ketogenic Diet For Beginners.’ Will be looking elsewhere for more helpful/in depth ‘how to’ info, and more practical meal plan solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Zatumarta

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This book was a waste of money. I bought it hoping it would help me understand the Keto Diet better, but it did not. It has a few pages of vague information, and then it gives you a two week meal plan that was complicated and full of all kinds of exotic foods and spices, that I laughed. You can find much more and much better information from Diet Doctor online. Also, all of the simple Keto recipes I use are found on Pinterest. Save yourself some time and money and don’t buy this book, even if you’re a Keto beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Wolverine

customer_reviews.title: Not at all Complete
customer_reviews.text: This was a big disappointment. While the book itself it beautifully layed out and well written, it explains very little. The recipe plan was ok. But it did not explain how many calories would be appropriate for different people. The suggested calories are almost double what I’m eating now. It offers information for diabetes but nothing for fatty liver or high cholesterol. I found more info for free on line.
customer_reviews.author: neat freak reviews

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: All the daily meal plans are between 30 and 40 net carbs a day, but the book says you have to be under 20 net carbs a day to be in ketosis. The recipes are ok, but I could not get some of them to turn out right. I would not recommend this for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Not informative enough
customer_reviews.text: There are many things that this book fails to mention while you are headed into your new diet, such as, how long it takes to get into ketosis and, when you do there is a thing called the keto flu that often happens to you that it also fails to mention, it has a ton of recipes, but those can easily be found on the internet. My advice is to try a different book
customer_reviews.author: Margie Parise

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than it's small price tag!
customer_reviews.text: This book gives a very basic explanation of Keto and a lot of great, easy prep recipes! We did the first weeks meal plan and figured out what we did and did not like and easily exchanged our dislikes for other recipes in the book. There are some typos regarding the amount of ingredients listed in the weekly shopping list, so be sure to verify the list against the recipes. Prep fat bombs, cookies, and lunches over the weekend. Smoothies are easily made the previous day, and most dinners are made in about 45 minutes. Just bought a copy for my Mom to ease her into this style of dieting!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H

customer_reviews.title: Great book for starting a ketogenic lifestyle! Live the tools included
customer_reviews.text: I liked this book a lot. As someone who had never really understood what a ketogenic diet was, this was a great start! I also bought The Everyday Ketogenic Kitchen because it had a lot more recipes that I'd use day to day. I am happy with both books. They both have different things in them and contribute to understanding and being able to successfully implement this new way of eating. I've lost 4 pounds already! I'm only two weeks in. This book has recommendations for macros calculators, macros trackers and a few Facebook groups so it's pretty up to date with how we eat, and live currently.
customer_reviews.author: JennyC

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive title
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT a complete ketogenic diet for beginners, the information it provides for the actual Keto diet is very general and limited. I was looking for a good go to book that included food lists and information on how to determine how many calories, fats and protein I should be consuming, but none if that information is in this book. It is basically a recipe book pages 50 to 141 are recipes, it should be titled 75 Keto Recipes. I would not recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Okay book
customer_reviews.text: Good book but I read the same stuff on the internet. It is nice it has recipes but they are not simple for the average person. Don't waste your money on the book, check the internet first.
customer_reviews.author: T. M. Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: Got me Going on Keto
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes in here... Cauliflower soup is the bomb. Helped get me into the diet, made it less complicated. I lost 50 lbs on keto (not necessarily all attributed to this book) but I've gained it all back as I came off the diet. Not reviewing keto here but as a forewarning to any looking into it, if you're not willing to make a pretty lifelong commitment, you'll have a difficult time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great book and great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! I like that there any introductory to keto and then recipes! It’s written in a very simple way to read.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Family

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes, easy preparations,
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying cookbooks with just a few recipes that I end up liking. This one was the best so far as having the most and best tasting dishes! I love that there wasn’t a ton of ingredients and all nutritional info followed each recipe. Loved the meal plans and how easy it was to follow! Highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More of a Cookbook and Recipes
customer_reviews.text: Got my book today and thought it was more about learning about Keto. It really only had a few pages that addressed what Keto is. After that it goes into meal planning, shopping list and recipes. Maybe there is not much more to tell than what is in the first pages of the book. It's a good book but I expected something a little more complete about the process. I know it's a book for beginners so maybe that's the reason. Still gave it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This book is very thorough explaining what the Keto diet is. However many of the recipes aren’t even Keto friendly. Aside from that, I had a hard time trying to find many of the ingredients at my local grocery stores. I would not recommend this book to anyone just starting out. Unless you know exactly what you can and cannot eat.
customer_reviews.author: CathrineES

customer_reviews.title: Great Info and Recipes on Keto
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with book. Just started on my Keto Life change and this book helped me so much. It gave me the tools I needed to start Keto and explained the standard diet. The book is 75% recipes and 25% info and instruction. I’ve tried a few of the recipes already and they were easy to follow and tasted very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner book for Keto
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Lot of good Keto recipes. Easy to make with recipes that someone who doesn’t like to cook can make.
customer_reviews.author: A regular shopper

customer_reviews.title: The perfect place to start
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful book. It delivers what it promises—a ketogenic diet for beginners. It explains the body chemistry; it enumerates the carb-laden foods and their keto-friendly counterparts. It gives you some basic recipes and offers some basic menus. It lists the cooking implements and appliances that will facilitate food preparation. It offers information on exercise and it provides 'support' information—methods to facilitate the reader's switch to a new diet. Most of all, it is inexpensive. This is not the ketogenic dieter's Larousse Gastronomique. It is an introduction. If you are thinking about switching to this diet this would be a good place to start.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.  SchwartzTop Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: This was just a recipe book, with 10-15 pages ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just a recipe book, with 10-15 pages of extremely basic keto information and advice, such as "drink water" and "clean out your pantry." I was wanting to actually learn about Keto and what it means to be fat adapted, tips and tricks, what to expect, common supplements to use and how they work in the body, what types of nutrients the body requires, how ketosis affects and improves the body, how it affects energy levels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This book is mainly a small cookbook for Keto recipes. There are only about 25 pages that actually educate you about the ketogenic diet. In those pages, they are extremely repetitive. I expected more details in book aimed at beginners. The recipes and 14 day meal plan are decent. If you are going after the meal plan and recipes, the book may be for you. If you truly are a beginner, you can find out lots more information by just reading some keto web-pages.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Guide for Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. It made the keto diet exceptionally easy to understand. The recipes included in the book are phenomenal as well. With the help of this book and the keto diet, I was able to fit back into my favorite jeans post-baby. My mother-in-law also borrowed this book when getting into keto & she's now lost 50 pounds! Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Designed for 1700 Calorie a Day Plan
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work for me as my plan is 1300 calories. I would have to attempt to convert the 480 calorie smoothies (and there are many near or around that #) to around 300 and tweak other meals or drop snacks altogether. Small meals work better so it is either do a LOT of conversions (making it harder) or find something different. Different it is. BUT..... For anyone that a 1700 cal/day works, Take a look at the shopping list for Week 1 (image). 80 items.... YES that is 8-Zero "80" items on the shopping list. :S WOW..... :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Information
customer_reviews.text: I knew absolutely nothing about the Keto diet. This gives a very thorough description of what the diet is, why it's important, health benefits, the differences in foods... It even gives you tips on shopping for the right foods. The recipes (so far) have been delicious. Many of the recipes will work for gluten free diets, lowering your carbs, losing weight, getting healthier... Whether you're on the Keto diet or not, it's good information to have and good recipes to cook by.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: False title
customer_reviews.text: This is a cook book. Total waste of money. I went with the “top rated” and I read customers reviews, no one said it was a cook book. Full of recipes, nothing to really read about the keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good information and recipes, bad meal plan
customer_reviews.text: I really liked reading through this book, the information was great and it really motivated me to start this diet. And the recipes I've tried are delicious. However, don't try to follow the meal plan unless you're trying to cook for a group of people. I tried it and had way too many leftovers to deal with, and rarely are the leftovers incorporated into the rest of the week. So now I have a ton of meals in my freezer that I have to try to work with later. If you're okay with that, then go for the meal plan. But I hate freezing leftovers so this wasn't really for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Virutec Computer Repair Approved.
customer_reviews.text: I run a small computer repair store and only leave reviews on the things I feel meet expectations. I am giving this item a 5 star because It works great with no problems. We probably spend over $50,000 a year on Amazon for our business, so finding the right parts in a timely matter at an affordable price so I can make some profit is key. We rely on Amazon to keep us in stock with parts.
customer_reviews.author: Virutec Computer Repair

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed,
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this book. For breakfast : Peanut Butter Cup Smoothie, Lemon cashew Smoothie, Some recipes are for 8 people, as Golden Rosti ( who is coming to eat this with me?) Or do I eat this for 4 days? You need to make the meals true out the day, and they are not very interesting and tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Easy Recipes
customer_reviews.text: The simple recipes are easy to follow. I'm happy it doesn't have a bunch of weird ingredients or specialized ingredients. We are enjoying the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Meg O

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful book for those wanting to change their way of thinking about diets! It’s not about “ Diets “ it’s about the way you want to feel inside as well as outside, it’s a walk to a lifetime of wellness,energy,etc.I rated this book a 5star because I am now on my journey to feeling so much better, body,mind, and soul! PS: Love the recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda  Bartgis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of information
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for beginners! I bought it for my dad, who was just diagnosed T2 diabetic. He's pretty old school and not wanting too many confusing things to abide by so, I wanted a book that was easily understood and not information overkill. I have The Ketogenic Bible, which I love, but it wouldn't have been a good match for him. This book is a perfect fit- plenty informative without beind tooo technical, and great recipes. Perfect!!! I recommend it for everyone, newbies, veterans, and everyone in between. I'll be ordering one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: katherine albritton

customer_reviews.title: etc was extremely helpful and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This book really helped me when I started my keto way of eating. The beginning of the book about why keto, what is keto, etc was extremely helpful and easy to read. The meal plan and following recipes are good. Some recipes are delicious - chicken bacon burgers! - and others are just average. However, I recommend this book for beginners or those curious about keto.
customer_reviews.author: GLP

customer_reviews.title: It seems like a refresh of the Atkin's diet
customer_reviews.text: This is more of a cookbook than a comprehensive diet plan. Did not work for me, as I don't have time to invest in cooking and trying different recipes. It seems like a refresh of the Atkin's diet, nothing really new here.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: Very Beginner book on healthy eating.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this book for information that is Very basic. This for someone who doesn't know where to start. I wasn't clear on the rules after reading it. The food and snacks for a slightly overweight person was too much food. I didn't even try to buy all that food and snacks $$. Most of the 1 things I like I could find online. Alternatives. Equipment? Who doesn't have tongs.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rockwell Rabkin

customer_reviews.title: What is a serving size?
customer_reviews.text: What I am having the most problem with this book is the recipes. The recipes are good with good ingredients, taste, and all of the necessary things that it takes to make up the Keto Diet and what to eat. But, when it comes to servings, it does not specify what a serving portion is to be able to understand if one is getting too much or to little of the requirements needed at the end of the day. I am keeping a food diary so it would be nice to know the portions that is considered a serving in the big picture so one can figure their percentages for each meal.
customer_reviews.author: JCMahoney

customer_reviews.title: Great book to read if you want to start Keto!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking into different websites and trying to find more knowledge about Keto and this book has been the best. If you are trying to understand what Keto is and how you can start, and if you even want to start, this is the best you can get all the info from.
customer_reviews.author: Azin Akbari

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: Just looking at the two week grocery list makes me realize this wasn’t the book for me. It’d be over $400 just to get everything for the first two weeks. Lots of goat cheese, some lamb, Protein powders, coconut oil/milk/cream. I still want to pursue keto but as much as I want to follow the 2 week diet, I’d have to modify and spend a fortune to do it, which is what kills diets for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Woodring

customer_reviews.title: Not enough information on keto
customer_reviews.text: I felt that the beginning of the book was very lacking in information on exactly what foods you should be eating, how much of them, how to calculate your carbs, etc. I was looking for a full list of carbs in various foods and there is very little information on that. If you're looking for keto recipes I guess this could be helpful, but I wanted more of a map on how to start keto. I found a lot more information on the web after this book failed me.
customer_reviews.author: JBN

customer_reviews.title: Best Keto book for beginners!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the recipes from this book. Not a bad meal yet. I've been on Keto for 3 weeks and following the recipes (not necessarily in the order the book has them in), and have lost 13 lbs, so far. My energy is incredible, and I have so much more endurance. Try this Book!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty basic book but really lacks photos. No desire to make recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Not many photos at all but the recipes are simple to make. So far everything is average tasting except for that raspberry cheesecake one- followed it to a T but major fail- texture is more on the baked egg side, very spongy in an egg way. I was actually hoping it would be more dense and taste cheesecake in some way but nope. After trying about 4 recipes, I decided to purchase another keto book and man am I being blown away by the new one.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Complicated recipes.  Disappointed with this book.
customer_reviews.text: Recipes include many items the average cook will not have in their pantry. The first two days` meals have Lamb Leg with sun-dried tomato pesto. Not meals you can make quickly, not to mention the cost to stock everything you will need. I'll keep the book, but I ordered two others from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a book for beginners! The 1st week's prep was a nightmare. Some good recipes, but too hard for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel A. Dyment

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad starter book, but no pictures of the food/recipes.
customer_reviews.author: deborah a doben

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity at best with this book
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at best with this book. There’s nothing here you can’t find just on Pinterest. There is a lack of scientific evidence but the recipe options are decent. Okay purchase but definitely not a great find. Just go online.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Geist

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT READ
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping Absolutely Perfect. Thank You Great Service will be a REPEAT Buyer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LWeesdum

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginning for Keto
customer_reviews.text: I have been so happy with the Keto diet that this book is a great plus for new recipes and a plus is the suggested shopping list. I have lost 8# in the first week and while it's slowed down a bit, the loss is daily. I LOVE Keto!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The Complete Ketogenic Diet For Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This book had high ratings so i purchased it from the Goodwill of Central Florida. I also live in Florida. Everything has been closed so long that i forgot i ordered it. I just wanted The Goodwill to know that eventhough the book is used, it looks brand new and im very happy with my purchase from you. Looking forward to getting rid of some of this almost 50 stomach i have. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The foreword of hows & whys is easy to read and understand but the menu plan is not for us. 44 pieces of bacon per week, love bacon but it is a processed food that is on the carcinogen list. It’s also just overly complicated for a beginner with esoteric ingredients & huge amounts of prep time.
customer_reviews.author: RSPanella

customer_reviews.title: This Is A Cookbook.....
customer_reviews.text: This is a cookbook....which is not stated in description....I was not looking for a cookbook...I wanted to learn about the Keto diet...what foods to eat and what foods not to eat.... and then make a decision if this was diet plan is something I could live with...I returned....if you are looking for a cookbook...then this may be for you....I think it is a fair price for the book....
customer_reviews.author: joanie

customer_reviews.title: good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: As a nutritionist I don't recommend a Ketogenic diet for everyone, but for those who need, or want, to lose weight in a short amount of time, this may be a good diet for you. This book explains the diet, how it works, and how you are to eat. I would recommend that you only use this diet for six months or less. It is high in fat and protien which is not healthy long term.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyne Natali

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t give the actual diet
customer_reviews.text: Great book But it still doesn’t break down the actual diet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this book. Nowhere on the front of the book does it say it's a recipe book. I was under the impression it was a book for reading about the diet. Also, the recipes do not have photos so they are not appealing. I would recommend purchasing a different book if you are looking for something other than a recipe book.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: It really Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned that I was waisting my money on this pricy product but I read the reviews and to my surprise it really works. I wanted to find out more info than what the Amazon description said. I was surprised to learn that you should take it on an empty stomach and don't drink a hot coffee at the same time. please look up information for yourself. Have a great day.
customer_reviews.author: Jani

customer_reviews.title: Great book to get you started!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I highly recommend this book. I followed the meal plan (with a little tweaking) and really enjoyed all of the recipes. The only bit of advice I would give is to look at the recipes and the amount of servings before you go shopping and start prepping. The grocery lists have way too much food and you really don’t need to make all of the snacks. I skipped the smoothies all together and replaced with meals/snacks that had a similar macro count. Each smoothie had a different flavor protein powder in it. I didn’t have any on hand so skipping them which saved me $120+ on my shopping bill.
customer_reviews.author: L-Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Information
customer_reviews.text: The diet seems easy enough to follow for someone who eats meat. I wanted to find out about the Keto diet, and I will have to pass on this one. I am a strict vegan, so much of what is being share will be hard to follow. However, there is some very useful information on the level of carbs in your foods, and the measurements I can apply to my everyday life. I thank the author for writing this book, and I hope she can write how vegans can accomplish the same with a meat free, egg free, dairy free diet.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Grey

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I sat up all night and read this book from cover to cover! This is the 2.5 book I've read about Keto. Including Dr Mercola's fat eating book.I think I'm almost ready to go Keto. I really liked this book. Easy to read, to the point. I'd recommend it to anyone that's looking at Keto.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This book has given us some great recipes in expanding our low-carb food plan
customer_reviews.text: I began to eat ketogenically about two months ago. This book has given us some great recipes in expanding our low-carb food plan. It also contains a cursory overview of the ketogenic way of eating and its benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Ann A. Re

customer_reviews.title: Need flavor? Choose another book
customer_reviews.text: Helpful Keto Diet tips but after following recipes I can’t look forward to a meal I made from them. With exception of bacon pepper fat bomb. MOST OTHERS VERY BLAND. I’ve given up sugar & any carbs above 20-25. Plz at least give me recipes with more flavor than parsley, salt & heavy whipping cream. Cauliflower recipes so lacking I’ve got to force myself to make something from the one I still have in fridge from week one shopping list.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Catman

customer_reviews.title: Received replacement for my misprinted copy
customer_reviews.text: The content of the book is great for someone who wants to learn basic information about this diet. The recipes also looked delicious and seemed pretty easy to make. However, I must have received a misprint of this book because I was missing pages 65-96, which was all of the fish & poultry recipes and half the meats recipes. I see that there are a few other reviewers that noted certain misprints. I'll be calling Amazon to see about getting a replacement because I'm very disappointed with this copy. EDIT: Called Amazon this morning and they sent me a new copy, which I received earlier this afternoon. Replacement copy is perfect, can't wait to get started!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Burks

customer_reviews.title: Good starter book, but reference other sources too.
customer_reviews.text: It did a good job of explaining the diet, and provided a list of do/don't foods. There are a lot of recipes included with a 2 week meal plan. I have been participating in this diet for awhile now and researched other sources of info. You have to be calorie conscious as well as carb conscious. Some of the recommendations are keto but packed with calories.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hoffman Sr

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful book for newbies to Keto!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this cook book for about a week (following the meal plans and shopping lists included inside, so helpful!) and so far we are really enjoying the diet, even the foods we wouldn’t normally eat have been tasty! Pictures is lamb topped with sun-dried tomato pesto with cauliflower mash and it was a hit at our house, even with the kid! The peanut butter cup smoothie is asked for daily!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes for a Keto dieter
customer_reviews.text: I realized this book wasn’t for me immediately when I saw the recipes(foods my family normally wouldn’t eat). I ordered this book because my good friend was going on a Keto diet and I thought I would too. She is very pleased that I got this book and gave it to her she is enjoying the recipes and it has helped her stay on her diet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not A lot of great recipes
customer_reviews.text: I got this cookbook under the impression there would be a lot of different recipes. Really, they are pretty basic recipes that you could find anywhere. The only ones I found that I might try are the smoothies. Tried to return the book but I would have to pay shipping so I would only get almost $2 back.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Nutritional Values
customer_reviews.text: This is not so much a review: How ever This book is very easy to follow and the food is wonderful. I've noticed a lot of the recipes use nuts or some type of nut oil. I have a server nut allergy. I substitute these items but I also know by doing this I am changing the nutritional values for that recipe. Does anyone know how to recalculate for the changes that I make.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Great to start on Keto and understand it.
customer_reviews.text: This book explains Keto and how to eat. Lost 9 lbs the first week which was motivating. Lots of tips and could have suggested keto pills and brain oil, which help a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H Benson

customer_reviews.title: This diet works!
customer_reviews.text: Many decades ago I used a similar diet, ( Atkins type of diet that worked back then ), Since that time I have tried others that did NOT work and watched the pounds slowly increase. I have now used this diet and lost 25 -30 lbs. within a two-month period. I have stopped temporarily, but will resume this diet again and see if Ican do a repeat performance.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fat bombs and dessert recipes better than the entrees. I did not like the shopping lists and meal plan, I disliked many of the recipes so would not have stuck to them at all. Got the cookbook by Jen Fisch and marked every single page of her recipes. I had high hopes for this one but sadly it did not meet my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: ... and this book covers it well Haven't felt this good in decades
customer_reviews.text: it worked end of story middle aged weight loos isn't just about diet but life style and this book covers it well Haven't felt this good in decades
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Starter Book
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific intro into the ketogenic diet. It tells you what you need to remove from your pantry and what can stay. And it tells you what you need to stock in to get started. You don't have to be an expert cook to whip up the recipes either - and they're pretty delicious. It would be nice to have more pictures of the recipes, but even without them I love this book and am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Kitty Mom

customer_reviews.title: I dont know - I guess I expected more from this book
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more. As someone who reads a lot (and who has read a lot of diet books and such) I expected more research, more history, more details and more recipes. For me - this book was not the greatest. It felt like it had very little info.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Kudos to Amy Ramos for writing a book that has maybe 30 pages of information anyone could get for free on the Internet and the rest of the book-the majority of it are recipes that you can get on the Internet for free. don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not helpful
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this beginners book very helpful for a first time beginner. There is not many good food list's as I thought there should be. Buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: girleygirl555

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Tough diet to stick to when you’re ONSESSED with carbs. But I was delightfully surprised at how much actual food you can eat. Basically all the cheese and bacon you can eat! The alterations I need to incorporate for my husband’s allergies made some dishes unappealing. But with trial and error we will get this figured out and we will be better versions of ourselves because of it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this is for beginners. I was hoping to see more recipes for things similar to what we already eat. I have to feed a family and this book didn't have what I needed to "begin" this diet. If you are not a beginner or if you don't have picky eaters you cook for, this book might be great for you!
customer_reviews.author: Felix & Kelly

customer_reviews.title: No Noticeable Reduction in Weight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Two bottles for my wife and I and after taking for Two weeks we have not seen any change in weight. I received a email from supplier offering a free bottle however, unless I see any improvement in performance of the so called weight reducing pill, this product will fall into the category of false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Arvid Podsim

customer_reviews.title: Calories aren’t calculated correctly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book for the recipes BUT the recipes don’t have tealistic nutrition info. Specifically the calorie counts, which can be off by several HUNDRED calories, completely ruining your keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Levy

customer_reviews.title: A recipe book without photos is just wrong
customer_reviews.text: A recipe book without photos is just wrong. There is a lot of useful info in the book, I like how they rate recipes for Keto friendliness. But there are no photos, which makes it really hard for non-expert cooks like me. I am a visual person. Other than free cookbooks which come with appliances, every cook book I have, has color photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this book. I would not say it’s for beginners. It has some information for beginners but as far as the recipes go, they aren’t simple or quick. Not what I was looking for. I thought it would have easy recipes for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: doreen bautista

customer_reviews.title: It's my keto bible!!
customer_reviews.text: Got me started and keeps me going. Not overwhelming, basic for non cookers like me and I loaded almost every recipe into the carb manager app. Excellent way to start the transition.
customer_reviews.author: Mizuka

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tell you about counting net carbs?!
customer_reviews.text: At no point in the book does it mention calculating net carbs. Total daily carbs=carbs minus fiber. A vital piece of information for counting your daily carbs. It's probably even dangerous to not calculate net carbs because you would be eating way less carbs than you think and not know why you're getting dizzy, etc. I only know about this now because of a friend who told me...if I had relied on the book I would be calculating the whole thing wrong until who knows when. Also I agree with some of the other reviewers that the recipes are too time-consuming and expensive. Very disappointed and will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: pegasus

customer_reviews.title: I tried quite a few recipes and they were horrible. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought specifically for the recipes as I can find all relevant information about the keto diet on line. I tried quite a few recipes and they were horrible. What a waste of money. At this point, I am just printing out recipes from on line since those recipes are rated. That is a much better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The Complete Ketogenic Diet for Beginners: Your Essential Guide to Living the Keto Lifestyle

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
